body_html:
@mrry You are right! I have updated all your comments::

  • Delete the useless FLAGS arguments and info outputs
  • Delete the cluster_setter() and inline it at the call site
  • Move the if statement to the same block where the `tf.train.SyncReplicasOptimizer' is constructed

Add two changes:

  • FLAGS.worker_index -> FLAGS.task_index
  • Add the GPU allocation

Please check the latest commit! Thanks for your comments.
body_text:
@mrry You are right! I have updated all your comments::

Delete the useless FLAGS arguments and info outputs
Delete the cluster_setter() and inline it at the call site
Move the if statement to the same block where the `tf.train.SyncReplicasOptimizer' is constructed

Add two changes:

FLAGS.worker_index -> FLAGS.task_index
Add the GPU allocation

Please check the latest commit! Thanks for your comments.
body:
@mrry You are right! I have updated all your comments::
- Delete the useless FLAGS arguments and info outputs
- Delete the `cluster_setter()` and inline it at the call site
- Move the `if` statement to the same block where the `tf.train.SyncReplicasOptimizer' is constructed 

Add two changes:
- FLAGS.worker_index -> FLAGS.task_index
- Add the GPU allocation 

Please check the latest commit! Thanks for your comments.
